name: Stupid Little Bird
description:
Stupid Little Bird is a game where you play as the mother bird protecting her little bird from getting itself killed.

Note: Some people have experienced an issue with the game where it runs faster than it should. If you feel like the flying mechanic is really heavy and difficult, you might experience that issue. I’m trying to fix it atm.

Controls

Left Right Arrows Keys - Move

Down Arrow Key - Crouch (when you crouch, the little bird will jump and bounce on you)

Z - Jump (press in the air to fly)

X - Calling (call to the little bird so it will be facing you)

Goal

Lead the little bird back to its nest. You can break its fall with your body, but this won't work if you're flying.
